minicp.engine.core

Class IntVarViewMul

  • java.lang.Object
    • minicp.engine.core.IntVarViewMul
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntVar

    public class IntVarViewMul
extends Object
implements IntVar
    A view on a variable of type a*x

      • propagateOnBind

        public void propagateOnBind(Constraint c)
        Description copied from interface: IntVar
        Asks that Constraint.propagate() is called whenever the domain of this variable is reduced to a singleton. In such a state the variable is bind and we say that a bind event occurs.
        Specified by:
        propagateOnBind in interface IntVar
        Parameters:
        c - the constraint for which the Constraint.propagate() method should be called on bind events of this variable.

        public void propagateOnBoundChange(Constraint c)
        Description copied from interface: IntVar
        Asks that Constraint.propagate() is called whenever the bound (maximum or minimum values) of the domain of this variable is changes. We say that a bound change event occurs in this case.
        Specified by:
        propagateOnBoundChange in interface IntVar
        Parameters:
        c - the constraint for which the Constraint.propagate() method should be called on bound change events of this variable.
